ygData.subject: Re: Weapons - IMO a level 15 Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: Patty, You got the right idea with your longswords, thats what i was using up untill i could afford to buy myself a whip and a Tommy. But as far as the 2h
ygData.messageBody:
Patty,

You got the right idea with your longswords, thats what i was using up
untill i could afford to buy myself a whip and a Tommy. But as far as the 2h
slashing goes im not that partial to the BBC..IMO its not all that good, the
minus really blows ... I just use a combine 2 hander right now, but i dont
even use it that much, i much rather the speed and damage i am gettting with
my 2 1h Slashing weapons. But thats just My opinion.
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 9:12 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Weapons - IMO a level 15 Warrior
>
> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> I have maxed out 1H Slashing and have 2H Slashing, Double Attack, and Dual
>
> Wield all in the High 50s.
>
> I am using a combine longsword and a fine steel longsword for my dual
> wield,
> and a fine steel 2H sword to build up my 2H skill.
>
> I've tried mino axes and such, but I just don't like the delay/damage
> ratio.
> 2H Slashing is ok for the damage, and with double attack getting better
> I
> get plenty of hits in during an attack - HOWEVER, nothing I have seen by
> any
> warrior deals death as plentiful as my two long swords with dual wield and
>
> double attack. It is wonderful to change camera view just to watch as the
>
> two swords fly. Attack, Attack, Attack, Attack, Bash, Attack, Attack,
> Attack, Attack, Attack, Attack, Bash!!!!
>
> Oh well, will have to see how good I am with my 2H Sword once I max out
> the
> skill. Like I said it works well now (24 to 25 a hit - with double attack
>
> up to 50 per round), but I still think my two longswords rule. Saving
> cash
> now to buy a second combine longsword.
>
> One last thing; talking to a 21 level warrior last night, the BBC is to
> him
> the best weapon he has seen. Of course it is a 2H weapon, so 2H Slashing
> is
> important to keep up.
>
> This is all my opinion as a level 15 Barbarian Warrior Princess.
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
>
> Patty of Halas
> username: Patricia
> server: Bristlebane
>
